subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Teams had to buy and install new posts, a tricky job, after the N.F.L. approved a measure to make the uprights five feet higher, or 35 feet above the crossbar, next season.
snippet: Teams had to buy and install new posts, a tricky job, after the N.F.L. approved a measure to make the uprights five feet higher, or 35 feet above the crossbar, next season.
